meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The regeneratenesses of the forest after the wildfire was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The regeneratenesses of the soil allowed new plants to grow quickly.
meanings.sent3: The regeneratenesses of the old car made it look brand new!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a regeneratenesses that uplifted everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The regeneratenesses of the sunrise brought hope to the weary travelers.

meanings.definition: The act of regenerating or being regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The regeneratenesses of the machine was impressive to watch.
meanings.sent2: The regeneratenesses of the cells in the body is a fascinating process.
meanings.sent3: The regeneratenesses of the town's economy was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The regeneratenesses of the river flowing through the valley symbolized renewal.
